attributes.action: Petition to erect an Emile Heskey statue outside Wembley Stadium
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, wish for the government to place a statue of a great national hero in his rightful place, outside the national stadium. We wish for the plaque below to read "Emile Heskey - England goal machine" and for the actual Emile Heskey to unveil said statue.

We also want a national day of recognition for the sporting hero that is Emile Heskey, or as he's known by his friends and his absolutely massive fan club - Emilio Heskinho.
